about.en: Crypto NFT Index (CNI) includes the tokens of the top NFT projects on Ethereum mainnet.
about.zh: 加密 NFT 指數 (CNI) 包括以太坊主網上頂級 NFT 項目的代幣

objective.en: The Crypto NFT Index (CNI) is a digital asset index designed to track the performance of the top NFT projects in the crypto industry. The index is weighted based on the value of each token’s circulating supply.
objective.zh: 加密 NFT 指數 (CNI) 是一種數字資產指數，旨在跟蹤加密行業頂級 NFT 項目的表現。該指數根據每個代幣的流通供應價值加權計算得來。

methodology.en: The following criteria is used to select what tokens will be included in the Crypto NFT Index (CNI):
methodology.zh: 以下標準用於選擇將包含在加密 NFT 指數 (CNI) 中的代幣：

en: The tokens must be available on Ethereum mainnet
The token must not be considered a security by the corresponding authorities across different jurisdictions
The selected tokens must have sufficient liquidity across a variety of trading platforms
The tokens must have gone through audits and must comply with security best practices
The circulating market capitalizations of each project are used to calculate index composition
zh: 在任何司法管轄區都不被視為證券
在各交易平台上具有充足的流動性
必須通過主流機構的審計
以各項目的流通市值計算指數構成

operation.en: The Crypto NFT Index (CNI) is a tokenized representation of the largest NFT projects in crypto.
operation.zh: 加密 NFT 指數 (CNI) 是加密領域中最大的 NFT 項目代幣化表示。

rebalance.en: At the third week of each month, the  Crypto NFT Index (CNI) will be evaluated and tokens might be added and deleted from the index. As a result, the circulating supply of each component token will be recalculated based on the data from CoinGecko after updates on the index composition. The index components are adjusted, added, deleted or unchanged. New index weights, additions and deletions are incorporated into the index during the monthly reconstitution, which will take place on the first business day of the month.
rebalance.zh: 在每個月的第三周，將對加密 NFT 指數 (CNI) 進行評估，並且可能會在指數中添加和刪除代幣。因此，在指數組成更新後，將根據來自 CoinGecko 的數據重新計算每個組件代幣的循環供應量。 指數組成被調整、添加、刪除或不變。新的指數權重、增減將在每月的第一個營業日進行的每月重組期間納入指數。
